original_text: And when they came down from the high place into the city, a bed was spread for Saul on the roof, and he lay down to sleep.
korean_text: 그들이 산당에서 내려 성읍에 들어가서는 사무엘이 사울과 함께 지붕에서 담화하고

sentences.original_text: And when they came down from the high place into the city
a bed was spread for Saul on the roof
and he lay down to sleep
